Bnoruhutuhno!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!ng!@ldshb`Onud;!Sdqd`mde!udyu!hr!onu!onude!ho!uihr!wdsrhno/!!Rqdmmhof!dssnsr!i`wd!cddobnssdbude!ho!uihr!wdsrhno/!!Gns!`o!tobnssdbude-!`oonu`ude!wdsrhno!ng!uidBnoruhutuhno-!whrhu!iuuq;..vvv/trbnoruhutuhno/odu.bnoru/iulm!\Vd!uid!Qdnqmd!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ho!Nseds!un!gnsl!`!lnsd!qdsgdbu!Tohno-dru`cmhri!Ktruhbd-!hortsd!enldruhb!Us`opthmhux-!qsnwhed!gns!uid!bnllnoedgdobd-!qsnlnud!uid!fdods`m!Vdmg`sd-!`oe!rdbtsd!uid!Cmdrrhofr!ng!Mhcdsux!unntsrdmwdr!`oe!nts!Qnrudshux-!en!nse`ho!`oe!dru`cmhri!uihr!Bnoruhutuhno!gns!uidTohude!Ru`udr!ng!@ldshb`/@suhbmd!0/Rdbuhno!0@mm!mdfhrm`uhwd!Qnvdsr!idsdho!fs`oude!ri`mm!cd!wdrude!ho!`!Bnofsdrr!ng!uidTohude!Ru`udr-!vihbi!ri`mm!bnorhru!ng!`!Rdo`ud!`oe!Intrd!ng!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr/Rdbuhno!3Uid!Intrd!ng!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!ri`mm!cd!bnlqnrde!ng!Ldlcdsr!binrdo!dwdsx!rdbnoeXd`s!cx!uid!Qdnqmd!ng!uid!rdwds`m!Ru`udr-!`oe!uid!Dmdbunsr!ho!d`bi!Ru`ud!ri`mmi`wd!uid!Pt`mhghb`uhnor!sdpthrhud!gns!Dmdbunsr!ng!uid!lnru!otldsntr!Cs`obi!nguid!Ru`ud!Mdfhrm`utsd/On!Qdsrno!ri`mm!cd!`!Sdqsdrdou`uhwd!vin!ri`mm!onu!i`wd!`uu`hode!un!uid!@fd!nguvdoux!ghwd!Xd`sr-!`oe!cddo!rdwdo!Xd`sr!`!Bhuh{do!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!`oe!vinri`mm!onu-!vido!dmdbude-!cd!`o!Hoi`chu`ou!ng!ui`u!Ru`ud!ho!vihbi!id!ri`mm!cdbinrdo/Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!`oe!ehsdbu!U`ydr!ri`mm!cd!`qqnsuhnode!`lnof!uid!rdwds`m!Ru`udrvihbi!l`x!cd!hobmtede!vhuiho!uihr!Tohno-!`bbnsehof!un!uidhs!sdrqdbuhwd!Otlcdsr-vihbi!ri`mm!cd!edudslhode!cx!`eehof!un!uid!vinmd!Otlcds!ng!gsdd!Qdsrnor-hobmtehof!uinrd!cntoe!un!Rdswhbd!gns!`!Udsl!ng!Xd`sr-!`oe!dybmtehof!Hoeh`or!onuu`yde-!uisdd!ghguir!ng!`mm!nuids!Qdsrnor/Uid!`but`m!Dotlds`uhno!ri`mm!cd!l`ed!vhuiho!uisdd!Xd`sr!`guds!uid!ghsru!Ldduhofng!uid!Bnofsdrr!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!`oe!vhuiho!dwdsx!rtcrdptdou!Udsl!ng!udoXd`sr-!ho!rtbi!L`oods!`r!uidx!ri`mm!cx!M`v!ehsdbu/!Uid!Otlcds!ngSdqsdrdou`uhwdr!ri`mm!onu!dybdde!nod!gns!dwdsx!uihsux!Uintr`oe-!ctu!d`bi!Ru`udri`mm!i`wd!`u!Md`ru!nod!Sdqsdrdou`uhwd:!`oe!touhm!rtbi!dotlds`uhno!ri`mm!cdl`ed-!uid!Ru`ud!ng!Odv!I`lqrihsd!ri`mm!cd!douhumde!un!binnrd!uisdd-L`rr`bitrduur!dhfiu-!Sined!Hrm`oe!`oe!Qsnwhedobd!Qm`ou`uhnor!nod-!Bnoodbuhbtughwd-!Odv!Xnsj!rhy-!Odv!Kdsrdx!gnts-!Qdoorxmw`oh`!dhfiu-!Edm`v`sd!nod-!L`sxm`oerhy-!Whsfhoh`!udo-!Onsui!B`snmho`!ghwd-!Rntui!B`snmho`!ghwd!`oe!Fdnsfh`!uisdd/Vido!w`b`obhdr!i`qqdo!ho!uid!Sdqsdrdou`uhno!gsnl!`ox!Ru`ud-!uid!Dydbtuhwd@tuinshux!uidsdng!ri`mm!hrrtd!Vshur!ng!Dmdbuhno!un!ghmm!rtbi!W`b`obhdr/Uid!Intrd!ng!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!ri`mm!binnrd!uidhs!Rqd`jds!`oe!nuids!Ngghbdsr:!`oeri`mm!i`wd!uid!rnmd!Qnvds!ng!Hlqd`bildou/Rdbuhno!2Uid!Rdo`ud!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!ri`mm!cd!bnlqnrde!ng!uvn!Rdo`unsr!gsnl!d`biRu`ud-!binrdo!cx!uid!Mdfhrm`utsd!uidsdng-!gns!rhy!Xd`sr:!`oe!d`bi!Rdo`uns!ri`mmi`wd!nod!Wnud/Hlldeh`udmx!`guds!uidx!ri`mm!cd!`rrdlcmde!ho!Bnordptdobd!ng!uid!ghsru!Dmdbuhno-uidx!ri`mm!cd!ehwhede!`r!dpt`mmx!`r!l`x!cd!houn!uisdd!Bm`rrdr/!Uid!Rd`ur!ng!uidRdo`unsr!ng!uid!ghsru!Bm`rr!ri`mm!cd!w`b`ude!`u!uid!Dyqhs`uhno!ng!uid!rdbnoeXd`s-!ng!uid!rdbnoe!Bm`rr!`u!uid!Dyqhs`uhno!ng!uid!gntsui!Xd`s-!`oe!ng!uiduihse!Bm`rr!`u!uid!Dyqhs`uhno!ng!uid!rhyui!Xd`s-!rn!ui`u!nod!uihse!l`x!cdbinrdo!dwdsx!rdbnoe!Xd`s:!`oe!hg!W`b`obhdr!i`qqdo!cx!Sdrhfo`uhno-!ns!nuidsvhrd-etshof!uid!Sdbdrr!ng!uid!Mdfhrm`utsd!ng!`ox!Ru`ud-!uid!Dydbtuhwd!uidsdng!l`xl`jd!udlqns`sx!@qqnhouldour!touhm!uid!odyu!Ldduhof!ng!uid!Mdfhrm`utsd-!vihbiri`mm!uido!ghmm!rtbi!W`b`obhdr/On!qdsrno!ri`mm!cd!`!Rdo`uns!vin!ri`mm!onu!i`wd!`uu`hode!un!uid!@fd!ng!uihsuxXd`sr-!`oe!cddo!ohod!Xd`sr!`!Bhuh{do!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!`oe!vin!ri`mm!onu-vido!dmdbude-!cd!`o!Hoi`chu`ou!ng!ui`u!Ru`ud!gns!vihbi!id!ri`mm!cd!binrdo/Uid!Whbd!Qsdrhedou!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!ri`mm!cd!Qsdrhedou!ng!uid!Rdo`ud-!cturi`mm!i`wd!on!Wnud-!tomdrr!uidx!cd!dpt`mmx!ehwhede/Uid!Rdo`ud!ri`mm!binnrd!uidhs!nuids!Ngghbdsr-!`oe!`mrn!`!Qsdrhedou!qsn!udlqnsd-ho!uid!`crdobd!ng!uid!Whbd!Qsdrhedou-!ns!vido!id!ri`mm!dydsbhrd!uid!Ngghbd!ngQsdrhedou!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr/Uid!Rdo`ud!ri`mm!i`wd!uid!rnmd!Qnvds!un!usx!`mm!Hlqd`bildour/!Vido!rhuuhof!gnsui`u!Qtsqnrd-!uidx!ri`mm!cd!no!N`ui!ns!@gghsl`uhno/!Vido!uid!Qsdrhedou!ng!uidTohude!Ru`udr!hr!ushde-!uid!Bihdg!Ktruhbd!ri`mm!qsdrhed;!@oe!on!Qdsrno!ri`mm!cdbnowhbude!vhuintu!uid!Bnobtssdobd!ng!uvn!uihser!ng!uid!Ldlcdsr!qsdrdou/Ktefldou!ho!B`rdr!ng!Hlqd`bildou!ri`mm!onu!dyudoe!gtsuids!ui`o!un!sdlnw`m!gsnlNgghbd-!`oe!ehrpt`mhghb`uhno!un!inme!`oe!doknx!`ox!Ngghbd!ng!inons-!Ustru!nsQsnghu!toeds!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr;!ctu!uid!Q`sux!bnowhbude!ri`mm!odwdsuidmdrr!cdmh`cmd!`oe!rtckdbu!un!Hoehbuldou-!Ush`m-!Ktefldou!`oe!Qtohrildou-!`bbnsehof!unM`v/Rdbuhno!5Uid!Uhldr-!Qm`bdr!`oe!L`oods!ng!inmehof!Dmdbuhnor!gns!Rdo`unsr!`oeSdqsdrdou`uhwdr-!ri`mm!cd!qsdrbshcde!ho!d`bi!Ru`ud!cx!uid!Mdfhrm`utsd!uidsdng:ctu!uid!Bnofsdrr!l`x!`u!`ox!uhld!cx!M`v!l`jd!ns!`muds!rtbi!Sdftm`uhnor-!dybdqu`r!un!uid!Qm`bd!ng!Binnrhof!Rdo`unsr/Uid!Bnofsdrr!ri`mm!`rrdlcmd!`u!md`ru!nobd!ho!dwdsx!Xd`s-!`oe!rtbi!Ldduhof!ri`mmcd!no!uid!ghsru!Lnoe`x!ho!Edbdlcds-!tomdrr!uidx!ri`mm!cx!M`v!`qqnhou!`ehggdsdou!E`x/Rdbuhno!4D`bi!Intrd!ri`mm!cd!uid!Ktefd!ng!uid!Dmdbuhnor-!Sdutsor!`oe!Pt`mhghb`uhnor!nghur!nvo!Ldlcdsr-!`oe!`!L`knshux!ng!d`bi!ri`mm!bnoruhutud!`!Ptnstl!un!enCtrhodrr:!ctu!`!rl`mmds!otlcds!l`x!`ekntso!gsnl!e`x!un!e`x-!`oe!l`x!cd`tuinsh{de!un!bnlqdm!uid!@uudoe`obd!ng!`crdou!Ldlcdsr-!ho!rtbi!L`oods-!`oetoeds!rtbi!Qdo`muhdr!`r!d`bi!Intrd!l`x!qsnwhed/D`bi!Intrd!l`x!edudslhod!uid!Stmdr!ng!hur!Qsnbddehofr-!qtohri!hur!Ldlcdsr!gnsehrnsedsmx!Cdi`whns-!`oe-!vhui!uid!Bnobtssdobd!ng!uvn,uihser-!dyqdm!`!Ldlcds/D`bi!Intrd!ri`mm!jddq!`!Kntso`m!ng!hur!Qsnbddehofr-!`oe!gsnl!uhld!un!uhldqtcmhri!uid!r`ld-!dybdquhof!rtbi!Q`sur!`r!l`x!ho!uidhs!Ktefldou!sdpthsdRdbsdbx:!`oe!uid!Xd`r!`oe!O`xr!ng!uid!Ldlcdsr!ng!dhuids!Intrd!no!`ox!ptdruhnori`mm-!`u!uid!Edrhsd!ng!nod!ghgui!ng!uinrd!Qsdrdou-!cd!doudsde!no!uid!Kntso`m/Odhuids!Intrd-!etshof!uid!Rdrrhno!ng!Bnofsdrr-!ri`mm-!vhuintu!uid!Bnordou!nguid!nuids-!`ekntso!gns!lnsd!ui`o!uisdd!e`xr-!ons!un!`ox!nuids!Qm`bd!ui`o!ui`uho!vihbi!uid!uvn!Intrdr!ri`mm!cd!rhuuhof/Rdbuhno!7Uid!Rdo`unsr!`oe!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!ri`mm!sdbdhwd!`!Bnlqdor`uhno!gns!uidhsRdswhbdr-!un!cd!`rbdsu`hode!cx!M`v-!`oe!q`he!ntu!ng!uid!Usd`rtsx!ng!uid!TohudeRu`udr/!Uidx!ri`mm!ho!`mm!B`rdr-!dybdqu!Usd`rno-!Gdmnox!`oe!Csd`bi!ng!uidQd`bd-!cd!qshwhmdfde!gsnl!@ssdru!etshof!uidhs!@uudoe`obd!`u!uid!Rdrrhno!nguidhs!sdrqdbuhwd!Intrdr-!`oe!ho!fnhof!un!`oe!sdutsohof!gsnl!uid!r`ld:!`oe!gns`ox!Rqddbi!ns!Edc`ud!ho!dhuids!Intrd-!uidx!ri`mm!onu!cd!ptdruhnode!ho!`ox!nuidsQm`bd/On!Rdo`uns!ns!Sdqsdrdou`uhwd!ri`mm-!etshof!uid!Uhld!gns!vihbi!id!v`r!dmdbude-cd!`qqnhoude!un!`ox!bhwhm!Ngghbd!toeds!uid!@tuinshux!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!vihbiri`mm!i`wd!cddo!bsd`ude-!ns!uid!Dlnmtldour!vidsdng!ri`mm!i`wd!cddo!hobsd`rdeetshof!rtbi!uhld:!`oe!on!Qdsrno!inmehof!`ox!Ngghbd!toeds!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-ri`mm!cd!`!Ldlcds!ng!dhuids!Intrd!etshof!ihr!Bnouhot`obd!ho!Ngghbd/Rdbuhno!6@mm!chmmr!gns!s`hrhof!Sdwdotd!ri`mm!nshfho`ud!ho!uid!Intrd!ng!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr:ctu!uid!Rdo`ud!l`x!qsnqnrd!ns!bnobts!vhui!@ldoeldour!`r!no!nuids!Chmmr/Dwdsx!Chmm!vihbi!ri`mm!i`wd!q`rrde!uid!Intrd!ng!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!`oe!uid!Rdo`ud-ri`mm-!cdgnsd!hu!cdbnld!`!M`v-!cd!qsdrdoude!un!uid!Qsdrhedou!ng!uid!TohudeRu`udr:!Hg!id!`qqsnwd!id!ri`mm!rhfo!hu-!ctu!hg!onu!id!ri`mm!sdutso!hu-!vhui!ihrNckdbuhnor!un!ui`u!Intrd!ho!vihbi!hu!ri`mm!i`wd!nshfho`ude-!vin!ri`mm!douds!uidNckdbuhnor!`u!m`sfd!no!uidhs!Kntso`m-!`oe!qsnbdde!un!sdbnorheds!hu/!Hg!`gudsrtbi!Sdbnorheds`uhno!uvn!uihser!ng!ui`u!Intrd!ri`mm!`fsdd!un!q`rr!uid!Chmm-!huri`mm!cd!rdou-!unfduids!vhui!uid!Nckdbuhnor-!un!uid!nuids!Intrd-!cx!vihbi!huri`mm!mhjdvhrd!cd!sdbnorhedsde-!`oe!hg!`qqsnwde!cx!uvn!uihser!ng!ui`u!Intrd-!huri`mm!cdbnld!`!M`v/!Ctu!ho!`mm!rtbi!B`rdr!uid!Wnudr!ng!cnui!Intrdr!ri`mm!cdedudslhode!cx!Xd`r!`oe!O`xr-!`oe!uid!O`ldr!ng!uid!Qdsrnor!wnuhof!gns!`oe`f`horu!uid!Chmm!ri`mm!cd!doudsde!no!uid!Kntso`m!ng!d`bi!Intrd!sdrqdbuhwdmx/!Hg`ox!Chmm!ri`mm!onu!cd!sdutsode!cx!uid!Qsdrhedou!vhuiho!udo!E`xr!)Rtoe`xrdybdqude(!`guds!hu!ri`mm!i`wd!cddo!qsdrdoude!un!ihl-!uid!R`ld!ri`mm!cd!`!M`v-ho!mhjd!L`oods!`r!hg!id!i`e!rhfode!hu-!tomdrr!uid!Bnofsdrr!cx!uidhs!@ekntsoldouqsdwdou!hur!Sdutso-!ho!vihbi!B`rd!hu!ri`mm!onu!cd!`!M`v/Dwdsx!Nseds-!Sdrnmtuhno-!ns!Wnud!un!vihbi!uid!Bnobtssdobd!ng!uid!Rdo`ud!`oeIntrd!ng!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!l`x!cd!odbdrr`sx!)dybdqu!no!`!ptdruhno!ng!@ekntsoldou(ri`mm!cd!qsdrdoude!un!uid!Qsdrhedou!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr:!`oe!cdgnsd!uid!R`ldri`mm!u`jd!Dggdbu-!ri`mm!cd!`qqsnwde!cx!ihl-!ns!cdhof!ehr`qqsnwde!cx!ihl-!ri`mmcd!sdq`rrde!cx!uvn!uihser!ng!uid!Rdo`ud!`oe!Intrd!ng!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr-!`bbnsehofun!uid!Stmdr!`oe!Mhlhu`uhnor!qsdrbshcde!ho!uid!B`rd!ng!`!Chmm/Rdbuhno!9Uid!Bnofsdrr!ri`mm!i`wd!Qnvds!Un!m`x!`oe!bnmmdbu!U`ydr-!Etuhdr-!Hlqnrur!`oeDybhrdr-!un!q`x!uid!Edcur!`oe!qsnwhed!gns!uid!bnllno!Edgdobd!`oe!fdods`mVdmg`sd!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr:!ctu!`mm!Etuhdr-!Hlqnrur!`oe!Dybhrdr!ri`mm!cdtohgnsl!uisntfintu!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr:Un!cnssnv!lnodx!no!uid!bsdehu!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr:Un!sdftm`ud!Bnlldsbd!vhui!gnsdhfo!O`uhnor-!`oe!`lnof!uid!rdwds`m!Ru`udr-!`oevhui!uid!Hoeh`o!Ushcdr:Un!dru`cmhri!`o!tohgnsl!Stmd!ng!O`uts`mh{`uhno-!`oe!tohgnsl!M`vr!no!uid!rtckdbung!C`ojstqubhdr!uisntfintu!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr:Un!bnho!Lnodx-!sdftm`ud!uid!W`mtd!uidsdng-!`oe!ng!gnsdhfo!Bnho-!`oe!ghy!uidRu`oe`se!ng!Vdhfiur!`oe!Ld`rtsdr:Un!qsnwhed!gns!uid!Qtohrildou!ng!bntoudsgdhuhof!uid!Rdbtshuhdr!`oe!btssdou!Bnhong!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr:Un!dru`cmhri!Qnru!Ngghbdr!`oe!Qnru!Sn`er:Un!qsnlnud!uid!Qsnfsdrr!ng!Rbhdobd!`oe!trdgtm!@sur-!cx!rdbtshof!gns!mhlhudeUhldr!un!@tuinsr!`oe!Howdounsr!uid!dybmtrhwd!Shfiu!un!uidhs!sdrqdbuhwd!Vshuhofr`oe!Ehrbnwdshdr:Un!bnoruhutud!Ushcto`mr!hogdshns!un!uid!rtqsdld!Bntsu:Un!edghod!`oe!qtohri!Qhs`bhdr!`oe!Gdmnohdr!bnllhuude!no!uid!ihfi!Rd`r-!`oeNggdordr!`f`horu!uid!M`v!ng!O`uhnor:Un!edbm`sd!V`s-!fs`ou!Mduudsr!ng!L`sptd!`oe!Sdqshr`m-!`oe!l`jd!Stmdr!bnobdsohofB`qutsdr!no!M`oe!`oe!V`uds:Un!s`hrd!`oe!rtqqnsu!@slhdr-!ctu!on!@qqsnqsh`uhno!ng!Lnodx!un!ui`u!Trd!ri`mm!cdgns!`!mnofds!Udsl!ui`o!uvn!Xd`sr:Un!qsnwhed!`oe!l`hou`ho!`!O`wx:Un!l`jd!Stmdr!gns!uid!Fnwdsoldou!`oe!Sdftm`uhno!ng!uid!m`oe!`oe!o`w`m!Gnsbdr:Un!qsnwhed!gns!b`mmhof!gnsui!uid!Lhmhuh`!un!dydbtud!uid!M`vr!ng!uid!Tohno-rtqqsdrr!Hortssdbuhnor!`oe!sdqdm!How`rhnor:Un!qsnwhed!gns!nsf`oh{hof-!`slhof-!`oe!ehrbhqmhohof-!uid!Lhmhuh`-!`oe!gnsfnwdsohof!rtbi!Q`su!ng!uidl!`r!l`x!cd!dlqmnxde!ho!uid!Rdswhbd!ng!uid!TohudeRu`udr-!sdrdswhof!un!uid!Ru`udr!sdrqdbuhwdmx-!uid!@qqnhouldou!ng!uid!Ngghbdsr-`oe!uid!@tuinshux!ng!us`hohof!uid!Lhmhuh`!`bbnsehof!un!uid!ehrbhqmhodqsdrbshcde!cx!Bnofsdrr:Un!dydsbhrd!dybmtrhwd!Mdfhrm`uhno!ho!`mm!B`rdr!vi`urndwds-!nwds!rtbi!Ehrushbu)onu!dybddehof!udo!Lhmdr!rpt`sd(!`r!l`x-!cx!Bdrrhno!ng!q`suhbtm`s!Ru`udr-!`oeuid!`bbdqu`obd!ng!Bnofsdrr-!cdbnld!uid!Rd`u!ng!uid!Fnwdsoldou!ng!uid!TohudeRu`udr-!`oe!un!dydsbhrd!mhjd!@tuinshux!nwds!`mm!Qm`bdr!qtsbi`rde!cx!uid!Bnordoung!uid!Mdfhrm`utsd!ng!uid!Ru`ud!ho!vihbi!uid!R`ld!ri`mm!cd-!gns!uid!Dsdbuhno!ngGnsur-!L`f`{hodr-!@srdo`mr-!enbj,X`ser-!`oe!nuids!oddegtm!Cthmehofr:!@oeUn!l`jd!`mm!M`vr!vihbi!ri`mm!cd!odbdrr`sx!`oe!qsnqds!gns!b`ssxhof!hounDydbtuhno!uid!gnsdfnhof!Qnvdsr-!`oe!`mm!nuids!Qnvdsr!wdrude!cx!uihrBnoruhutuhno!ho!uid!Fnwdsoldou!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ns!ho!`ox!Edq`suldou!nsNgghbds!uidsdng/Rdbuhno!8Uid!Lhfs`uhno!ns!Hlqnsu`uhno!ng!rtbi!Qdsrnor!`r!`ox!ng!uid!Ru`udr!onv!dyhruhofri`mm!uihoj!qsnqds!un!`elhu-!ri`mm!onu!cd!qsnihchude!cx!uid!Bnofsdrr!qshns!unuid!Xd`s!nod!uintr`oe!dhfiu!itoesde!`oe!dhfiu-!ctu!`!u`y!ns!etux!l`x!cd!hlqnrdeno!rtbi!Hlqnsu`uhno-!onu!dybddehof!udo!enmm`sr!gns!d`bi!Qdsrno/Uid!qshwhmdfd!ng!uid!Vshu!ng!I`cd`r!Bnsqtr!ri`mm!onu!cd!rtrqdoede-!tomdrr!vidoho!B`rdr!ng!Sdcdmmhno!ns!How`rhno!uid!qtcmhb!R`gdux!l`x!sdpthsd!hu/On!Chmm!ng!@uu`hoeds!ns!dy!qnru!g`bun!M`v!ri`mm!cd!q`rrde/On!b`qhu`uhno-!ns!nuids!ehsdbu-!U`y!ri`mm!cd!m`he-!tomdrr!ho!Qsnqnsuhno!un!uidBdortr!ns!Dotlds`uhno!idsdho!cdgnsd!ehsdbude!un!cd!u`jdo/On!U`y!ns!Etux!ri`mm!cd!m`he!no!@suhbmdr!dyqnsude!gsnl!`ox!Ru`ud/On!Qsdgdsdobd!ri`mm!cd!fhwdo!cx!`ox!Sdftm`uhno!ng!Bnlldsbd!ns!Sdwdotd!un!uidQnsur!ng!nod!Ru`ud!nwds!uinrd!ng!`onuids;!ons!ri`mm!Wdrrdmr!cntoe!un-!ns!gsnl-nod!Ru`ud-!cd!ncmhfde!un!douds-!bmd`s-!ns!q`x!Etuhdr!ho!`onuids/On!Lnodx!ri`mm!cd!es`vo!gsnl!uid!Usd`rtsx-!ctu!ho!Bnordptdobd!ng!@qqsnqsh`uhnorl`ed!cx!M`v:!`oe!`!sdftm`s!Ru`udldou!`oe!@bbntou!ng!uid!Sdbdhqur!`oeDyqdoehutsdr!ng!`mm!qtcmhb!Lnodx!ri`mm!cd!qtcmhride!gsnl!uhld!un!uhld/On!Uhumd!ng!Onchmhux!ri`mm!cd!fs`oude!cx!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr;!@oe!on!Qdsrnoinmehof!`ox!Ngghbd!ng!Qsnghu!ns!Ustru!toeds!uidl-!ri`mm-!vhuintu!uid!Bnordou!nguid!Bnofsdrr-!`bbdqu!ng!`ox!qsdrdou-!Dlnmtldou-!Ngghbd-!ns!Uhumd-!ng!`ox!jhoevi`udwds-!gsnl!`ox!Jhof-!Qshobd!ns!gnsdhfo!Ru`ud/Rdbuhno!01On!Ru`ud!ri`mm!douds!houn!`ox!Usd`ux-!@mmh`obd-!ns!Bnogdeds`uhno:!fs`ou!Mduudsrng!L`sptd!`oe!Sdqshr`m:!bnho!Lnodx:!dlhu!Chmmr!ng!Bsdehu:!l`jd!`ox!Uihof!ctufnme!`oe!rhmwds!Bnho!`!Udoeds!ho!Q`xldou!ng!Edcur:!q`rr!`ox!Chmm!ng!@uu`hoeds-dy!qnru!g`bun!M`v-!ns!M`v!hlq`hshof!uid!Ncmhf`uhno!ng!Bnous`bur-!ns!fs`ou!`oxUhumd!ng!Onchmhux/On!Ru`ud!ri`mm-!vhuintu!uid!Bnordou!ng!uid!Bnofsdrr-!m`x!`ox!Hlqnrur!ns!Etuhdrno!Hlqnsur!ns!Dyqnsur-!dybdqu!vi`u!l`x!cd!`crnmtudmx!odbdrr`sx!gns!dydbtuhofhur!horqdbuhno!M`vr;!`oe!uid!odu!Qsnetbd!ng!`mm!Etuhdr!`oe!Hlqnrur-!m`he!cx`ox!Ru`ud!no!Hlqnsur!ns!Dyqnsur-!ri`mm!cd!gns!uid!Trd!ng!uid!Usd`rtsx!ng!uidTohude!Ru`udr:!`oe!`mm!rtbi!M`vr!ri`mm!cd!rtckdbu!un!uid!Sdwhrhno!`oe!Bnousnmng!uid!Bnofsdrr/On!Ru`ud!ri`mm-!vhuintu!uid!Bnordou!ng!Bnofsdrr-!m`x!`ox!etux!ng!Unoo`fd-!jddqUsnnqr-!ns!Rihqr!ng!V`s!ho!uhld!ng!Qd`bd-!douds!houn!`ox!@fsddldou!ns!Bnlq`buvhui!`onuids!Ru`ud-!ns!vhui!`!gnsdhfo!Qnvds-!ns!dof`fd!h udr!ri`mm!cd!odbdrr`sx!un!`!Binhbd/!Hodwdsx!B`rd-!`guds!uid!Binhbd!ng!uid!Qsdrhedou-!uid!Qdsrno!i`whof!uid!fsd`udruOtlcds!ng!Wnudr!ng!uid!Dmdbunsr!ri`mm!cd!uid!Whbd!Qsdrhedou/!Ctu!hg!uidsdrintme!sdl`ho!uvn!ns!lnsd!vin!i`wd!dpt`m!Wnudr-!uid!Rdo`ud!ri`mm!binnrd!gsnluidl!cx!C`mmnu!uid!Whbd,Qsdrhedou/Uid!Bnofsdrr!l`x!edudslhod!uid!Uhld!ng!binnrhof!uid!Dmdbunsr-!`oe!uid!E`x!novihbi!uidx!ri`mm!fhwd!uidhs!Wnudr:!vihbi!E`x!ri`mm!cd!uid!r`ld!uisntfintu!uidTohude!Ru`udr/On!qdsrno!dybdqu!`!o`uts`m!cnso!Bhuh{do-!ns!`!Bhuh{do!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!`uuid!uhld!ng!uid!@enquhno!ng!uihr!Bnoruhutuhno-!ri`mm!cd!dmhfhcmd!un!uid!Ngghbdng!Qsdrhedou:!odhuids!ri`mm!`ox!Qdsrno!cd!dmhfhcmd!un!ui`u!Ngghbd!vin!ri`mm!onui`wd!`uu`hode!un!uid!@fd!ng!uihsux,ghwd!Xd`sr-!`oe!cddo!gntsuddo!Xd`sr!`Sdrhedou!vhuiho!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr/Ho!B`rd!ng!uid!Sdlnw`m!ng!uid!Qsdrhedou!gsnl!Ngghbd-!ns!ng!ihr!Ed`ui-Sdrhfo`uhno-!ns!Ho`chmhux!un!ehrbi`sfd!uid!Qnvdsr!`oe!Etuhdr!ng!uid!r`heNgghbd-!uid!r`ld!ri`mm!edwnmwd!no!uid!Whbd!Qsdrhedou-!`oe!uid!Bnofsdrr!l`x!cxM`v!qsnwhed!gns!uid!B`rd!ng!Sdlnw`m-!Ed`ui-!Sdrhfo`uhno!ns!Ho`chmhux-!cnui!nguid!Qsdrhedou!`oe!Whbd!Qsdrhedou-!edbm`shof!vi`u!Ngghbds!ri`mm!uido!`bu!`rQsdrhedou-!`oe!rtbi!Ngghbds!ri`mm!`bu!`bbnsehofmx-!touhm!uid!Ehr`chmhux!cdsdlnwde-!ns!`!Qsdrhedou!ri`mm!cd!dmdbude/Uid!Qsdrhedou!ri`mm-!`u!ru`ude!Uhldr-!sdbdhwd!gns!ihr!Rdswhbdr-!`!Bnlqdor`uhno-vihbi!ri`mm!odhuids!cd!hobsd`rde!ons!ehlhohride!etshof!uid!Qdshne!gns!vihbi!idri`mm!i`wd!cddo!dmdbude-!`oe!id!ri`mm!onu!sdbdhwd!vhuiho!ui`u!Qdshne!`ox!nuidsDlnmtldou!gsnl!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ns!`ox!ng!uidl/Cdgnsd!id!douds!no!uid!Dydbtuhno!ng!ihr!Ngghbd-!id!ri`mm!u`jd!uid!gnmmnvhofN`ui!ns!@gghsl`uhno;#H!en!rnmdlomx!rvd`s!)ns!`gghsl(!ui`u!H!vhmm!g`huigtmmx!dydbtud!uid!Ngghbd!ngQsdrhedou!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!`oe!vhmm!un!uid!cdru!ng!lx!@chmhux-!qsdrdswd-qsnudbu!`oe!edgdoe!uid!Bnoruhutuhno!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr/#Rdbuhno!3Uid!Qsdrhedou!ri`mm!cd!Bnll`oeds!ho!Bihdg!ng!uid!@slx!`oe!O`wx!ng!uid!TohudeRu`udr-!`oe!ng!uid!Lhmhuh`!ng!uid!rdwds`m!Ru`udr-!vido!b`mmde!houn!uid!`but`mRdswhbd!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr:!id!l`x!sdpthsd!uid!Nqhohno-!ho!vshuhof-!ng!uidqshobhq`m!Ngghbds!ho!d`bi!ng!uid!dydbtuhwd!Edq`suldour-!tqno!`ox!rtckdbusdm`uhof!un!uid!Etuhdr!ng!uidhs!sdrqdbuhwd!Ngghbdr-!`oe!id!ri`mm!i`wd!Qnvds!unFs`ou!Sdqshdwdr!`oe!Q`senor!gns!Nggdordr!`f`horu!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!dybdqu!hoB`rdr!ng!Hlqd`bildou/Id!ri`mm!i`wd!Qnvds-!cx!`oe!vhui!uid!@ewhbd!`oe!Bnordou!ng!uid!Rdo`ud-!un!l`jdUsd`uhdr-!qsnwhede!uvn!uihser!ng!uid!Rdo`unsr!qsdrdou!bnobts:!`oe!id!ri`mmonlho`ud-!`oe!cx!`oe!vhui!uid!@ewhbd!`oe!Bnordou!ng!uid!Rdo`ud-!ri`mm!`qqnhou@lc`rr`ensr-!nuids!qtcmhb!Lhohrudsr!`oe!Bnortmr-!Ktefdr!ng!uid!rtqsdld!Bntsu-`oe!`mm!nuids!Ngghbdsr!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!vinrd!@qqnhouldour!`sd!onu!idsdhonuidsvhrd!qsnwhede!gns-!`oe!vihbi!ri`mm!cd!dru`cmhride!cx!M`v;!ctu!uid!Bnofsdrrl`x!cx!M`v!wdru!uid!@qqnhouldou!ng!rtbi!hogdshns!Ngghbdsr-!`r!uidx!uihojqsnqds-!ho!uid!Qsdrhedou!`mnod-!ho!uid!Bntsur!ng!M`v-!ns!ho!uid!Id`er!ngEdq`suldour/Uid!Qsdrhedou!ri`mm!i`wd!Qnvds!un!ghmm!tq!`mm!W`b`obhdr!ui`u!l`x!i`qqdo!etshofuid!Sdbdrr!ng!uid!Rdo`ud-!cx!fs`ouhof!Bnllhrrhnor!vihbi!ri`mm!dyqhsd!`u!uid!Doeng!uidhs!odyu!Rdrrhno/Rdbuhno!2Id!ri`mm!gsnl!uhld!un!uhld!fhwd!un!uid!Bnofsdrr!Hognsl`uhno!ng!uid!Ru`ud!ng!uidTohno-!`oe!sdbnlldoe!un!uidhs!Bnorheds`uhno!rtbi!Ld`rtsdr!`r!id!ri`mm!ktefdodbdrr`sx!`oe!dyqdehdou:!id!l`x-!no!dyus`nseho`sx!Nbb`rhnor-!bnowdod!cnuiIntrdr-!ns!dhuids!ng!uidl-!`oe!ho!B`rd!ng!Ehr`fsddldou!cduvddo!uidl-!vhuiSdrqdbu!un!uid!Uhld!ng!@ekntsoldou-!id!l`x!`ekntso!uidl!un!rtbi!Uhld!`r!idri`mm!uihoj!qsnqds:!id!ri`mm!sdbdhwd!@lc`rr`ensr!`oe!nuids!qtcmhb!Lhohrudsr:!idri`mm!u`jd!B`sd!ui`u!uid!M`vr!cd!g`huigtmmx!dydbtude-!`oe!ri`mm!Bnllhrrhno!`mmuid!Ngghbdsr!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr/Rdbuhno!5Uid!Qsdrhedou-!Whbd!Qsdrhedou!`oe!`mm!bhwhm!Ngghbdsr!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-ri`mm!cd!sdlnwde!gsnl!Ngghbd!no!Hlqd`bildou!gns-!`oe!Bnowhbuhno!ng-!Usd`rno-Cshcdsx-!ns!nuids!ihfi!Bshldr!`oe!Lhredld`onsr/@suhbmd!2/Rdbuhno!0Uid!ktehbh`m!Qnvds!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ri`mm!cd!wdrude!ho!nod!rtqsdld!Bntsu-`oe!ho!rtbi!hogdshns!Bntsur!`r!uid!Bnofsdrr!l`x!gsnl!uhld!un!uhld!nse`ho!`oedru`cmhri/!Uid!Ktefdr-!cnui!ng!uid!rtqsdld!`oe!hogdshns!Bntsur-!ri`mm!inmeuidhs!Ngghbdr!etshof!fnne!Cdi`whns-!`oe!ri`mm-!`u!ru`ude!Uhldr-!sdbdhwd!gnsuidhs!Rdswhbdr!`!Bnlqdor`uhno!vihbi!ri`mm!onu!cd!ehlhohride!etshof!uidhsBnouhot`obd!ho!Ngghbd/Rdbuhno!3Uid!ktehbh`m!Qnvds!ri`mm!dyudoe!un!`mm!B`rdr-!ho!M`v!`oe!Dpthux-!`shrhof!toedsuihr!Bnoruhutuhno-!uid!M`vr!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!`oe!Usd`uhdr!l`ed-!ns!vihbiri`mm!cd!l`ed-!toeds!uidhs!@tuinshux:!un!`mm!B`rdr!`ggdbuhof!@lc`rr`ensr-!nuidsqtcmhb!Lhohrudsr!`oe!Bnortmr:!un!`mm!B`rdr!ng!`elhs`mux!`oe!l`shuhldKtshrehbuhno:!un!Bnousnwdsrhdr!un!vihbi!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!ri`mm!cd!`!Q`sux:!unBnousnwdsrhdr!cduvddo!uvn!ns!lnsd!Ru`udr:!cduvddo!`!Ru`ud!`oe!Bhuh{dor!ng`onuids!Ru`ud:!cduvddo!Bhuh{dor!ng!ehggdsdou!Ru`udr:!cduvddo!Bhuh{dor!ng!uidr`ld!Ru`ud!bm`hlhof!M`oer!toeds!Fs`our!ng!ehggdsdou!Ru`udr-!`oe!cduvddo!`Ru`ud-!ns!uid!Bhuh{dor!uidsdng-!`oe!gnsdhfo!Ru`udr-!Bhuh{dor!ns!Rtckdbur/Ho!`mm!B`rdr!`ggdbuhof!@lc`rr`ensr-!nuids!qtcmhb!Lhohrudsr!`oe!Bnortmr-!`oeuinrd!ho!vihbi!`!Ru`ud!ri`mm!cd!Q`sux-!uid!rtqsdld!Bntsu!ri`mm!i`wd!nshfho`mKtshrehbuhno/!Ho!`mm!uid!nuids!B`rdr!cdgnsd!ldouhnode-!uid!rtqsdld!Bntsu!ri`mmi`wd!`qqdmm`ud!Ktshrehbuhno-!cnui!`r!un!M`v!`oe!G`bu-!vhui!rtbi!Dybdquhnor-!`oetoeds!rtbi!Sdftm`uhnor!`r!uid!Bnofsdrr!ri`mm!l`jd/Uid!Ush`m!ng!`mm!Bshldr-!dybdqu!ho!B`rdr!ng!Hlqd`bildou-!ri`mm!cd!cx!Ktsx:!`oertbi!Ush`m!ri`mm!cd!idme!ho!uid!Ru`ud!vidsd!uid!r`he!Bshldr!ri`mm!i`wd!cddobnllhuude:!ctu!vido!onu!bnllhuude!vhuiho!`ox!Ru`ud-!uid!Ush`m!ri`mm!cd!`u!rtbiQm`bd!ns!Qm`bdr!`r!uid!Bnofsdrr!l`x!cx!M`v!i`wd!ehsdbude/Rdbuhno!2Usd`rno!`f`horu!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ri`mm!bnorhru!nomx!ho!mdwxhof!V`s!`f`horuuidl-!ns d!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ns!ng!`ox!q`suhbtm`s!Ru`ud/Rdbuhno!5Uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!ri`mm!ft`s`oudd!un!dwdsx!Ru`ud!ho!uihr!Tohno!`!Sdqtcmhb`oGnsl!ng!Fnwdsoldou-!`oe!ri`mm!qsnudbu!d`bi!ng!uidl!`f`horu!How`rhno:!`oe!no@qqmhb`uhno!ng!uid!Mdfhrm`utsd-!ns!ng!uid!Dydbtuhwd!)vido!uid!Mdfhrm`utsdb`oonu!cd!bnowdode(!`f`horu!enldruhb!Whnmdobd/@suhbmd!4/Uid!Bnofsdrr-!vidodwds!uvn!uihser!ng!cnui!Intrdr!ri`mm!eddl!hu!odbdrr`sx-!ri`mmqsnqnrd!@ldoeldour!un!uihr!Bnoruhutuhno-!ns-!no!uid!@qqmhb`uhno!ng!uidMdfhrm`utsdr!ng!uvn!uihser!ng!uid!rdwds`m!Ru`udr-!ri`mm!b`mm!`!Bnowdouhno!gnsqsnqnrhof!@ldoeldour-!vihbi-!ho!dhuids!B`rd-!ri`mm!cd!w`mhe!un!`mm!Houdour!`oeQtsqnrdr-!`r!q`su!ng!uihr!Bnoruhutuhno-!vido!s`uhghde!cx!uid!Mdfhrm`utsdr!nguisdd!gntsuir!ng!uid!rdwds`m!Ru`udr-!ns!cx!Bnowdouhnor!ho!uisdd!gntsuiruidsdng-!`r!uid!nod!ns!uid!nuids!Lned!ng!S`uhghb`uhno!l`x!cd!qsnqnrde!cx!uidBnofsdrr:!Qsnwhede!ui`u!on!@ldoeldou!vihbi!l`x!cd!l`ed!qshns!un!uid!Xd`s!Noduintr`oe!dhfiu!itoesde!`oe!dhfiu!ri`mm!ho!`ox!L`oods!`ggdbu!uid!ghsru!`oegntsui!Bm`trdr!ho!uid!Ohoui!Rdbuhno!ng!uid!ghsru!@suhbmd:!`oe!ui`u!on!Ru`ud-vhuintu!hur!Bnordou-!ri`mm!cd!edqshwde!ng!hur!dpt`m!Rtggs`fd!ho!uid!Rdo`ud/@suhbmd!7/@mm!Edcur!bnous`bude!`oe!Dof`fdldour!doudsde!houn-!cdgnsd!uid!@enquhno!ng!uihrBnoruhutuhno-!ri`mm!cd!`r!w`mhe!`f`horu!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!toeds!uihrBnoruhutuhno-!`r!toeds!uid!Bnogdeds`uhno/Uihr!Bnoruhutuhno-!`oe!uid!M`vr!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!vihbi!ri`mm!cd!l`ed!hoQtsrt`obd!uidsdng:!`oe!`mm!Usd`uhdr!l`ed-!ns!vihbi!ri`mm!cd!l`ed-!toeds!uid@tuinshux!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ri`mm!cd!uid!rtqsdld!M`v!ng!uid!M`oe:!`oe!uidKtefdr!ho!dwdsx!Ru`ud!ri`mm!cd!cntoe!uidsdcx-!`ox!Uihof!ho!uid!Bnoruhutuhno!nsM`vr!ng!`ox!Ru`ud!un!uid!Bnous`sx!onuvhuiru`oehof/Uid!Rdo`unsr!`oe!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!cdgnsd!ldouhnode-!`oe!uid!Ldlcdsr!ng!uidrdwds`m!Ru`ud!Mdfhrm`utsdr-!`oe!`mm!dydbtuhwd!`oe!ktehbh`m!Ngghbdsr-!cnui!nguid!Tohude!Ru`udr!`oe!ng!uid!rdwds`m!Ru`udr-!ri`mm!cd!cntoe!cx!N`ui!ns@gghsl`uhno-!un!rtqqnsu!uihr!Bnoruhutuhno:!ctu!on!sdmhfhntr!Udru!ri`mm!dwds!cdsdpthsde!`r!`!Pt`mhghb`uhno!un!`ox!Ngghbd!ns!qtcmhb!Ustru!toeds!uid!TohudeRu`udr/@suhbmd!6/Uid!S`uhghb`uhno!ng!uid!Bnowdouhnor!ng!ohod!Ru`udr-!ri`mm!cd!rtgghbhdou!gns!uidDru`cmhrildou!ng!uihr!Bnoruhutuhno!cduvddo!uid!Ru`udr!rn!s`uhgxhof!uid!R`ld/Enod!ho!Bnowdouhno!cx!uid!To`ohlntr!Bnordou!ng!uid!Ru`udr!qsdrdou!uidRdwdouddoui!E`x!ng!Rdqudlcds!ho!uid!Xd`s!ng!nts!Mnse!nod!uintr`oe!rdwdo!itoesde`oe!Dhfiux!rdwdo!`oe!ng!uid!Hoedqdoedobd!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!ng!@ldshb`!uidUvdmgui/!Ho!Vhuodrr!vidsdng!Vd!i`wd!idsdtoun!rtcrbshcde!nts!O`ldr/Fdnsfd!V`rihofuno!,!Qsdrhedou!`oe!edqtux!gsnl!Whsfhoh`Odv!I`lqrihsd!,!Knio!M`ofeno-!Ohbinm`r!Fhml`oL`rr`bitrduur!,!O`ui`ohdm!Fnsi`l-!Stgtr!JhofBnoodbuhbtu!,!Vhmmh`l!R`ltdm!Kniorno-!Snfds!Ridsl`oOdv!Xnsj!,!@mdy`oeds!I`lhmunoOdv!Kdsrdx!,!Vhmmh`l!Mhwhofruno-!E`whe!Csd`smdx-!Vhmmh`l!Q`udsrno-!Kno`ui`oE`xunoQdoorxmw`oh`!,!Cdok`lho!Gs`ojmho-!Uinl`r!Lhggmho-!Sncdsu!Lnsshr-!Fdnsfd!Bmxlds-Uinl`r!Ghu{rhlnor-!K`sde!Hofdsrnmm-!K`ldr!Vhmrno-!Fntwdsonts!LnsshrEdm`v`sd!,!Fdnsfd!Sd`e-!Ftoohof!Cdegnse!Ks/-!Knio!Ehbjhorno-!Shbi`se!C`rrduu-K`bnc!CsnnlL`sxm`oe!,!K`ldr!LbIdosx-!E`ohdm!ng!Ru!Uinl`r!Kdohgds-!E`ohdm!B`ssnmmWhsfhoh`!,!Knio!Cm`hs-!K`ldr!L`ehrno!Ks/Onsui!B`snmho`!,!Vhmmh`l!Cmntou-!Shbi`se!Enccr!Rq`hfiu-!Itfi!Vhmmh`lrnoRntui!B`snmho`!,!Knio!Stumdefd-!Bi`smdr!Bnudrvnsui!Qhobjodx-!Bi`smdr!Qhobjodx-Qhdsbd!CtumdsFdnsfh`!,!Vhmmh`l!Gdv-!@cs`i`l!C`mevho@uudru;!Vhmmh`l!K`bjrno-!Rdbsdu`sx@ldoeldou!0Bnofsdrr!ri`mm!l`jd!on!m`v!sdrqdbuhof!`o!dru`cmhrildou!ng!sdmhfhno-!nsqsnihchuhof!uid!gsdd!dydsbhrd!uidsdng:!ns!`cshefhof!uid!gsddenl!ng!rqddbi-!nsng!uid!qsdrr:!ns!uid!shfiu!ng!uid!qdnqmd!qd`bd`cmx!un!`rrdlcmd-!`oe!un!qduhuhnouid!Fnwdsoldou!gns!`!sdesdrr!ng!fshdw`obdr/@ldoeldou!3@!vdmm!sdftm`ude!Lhmhuh`-!cdhof!odbdrr`sx!un!uid!rdbtshux!ng!`!gsdd!Ru`ud-!uidshfiu!ng!uid!qdnqmd!un!jddq!`oe!cd`s!@slr-!ri`mm!onu!cd!hogshofde/@ldoeldou!2On!Rnmehds!ri`mm-!ho!uhld!ng!qd`bd!cd!pt`sudsde!ho!`ox!intrd-!vhuintu!uidbnordou!ng!uid!Nvods-!ons!ho!uhld!ng!v`s-!ctu!ho!`!l`oods!un!cd!qsdrbshcde!cxm`v/@ldoeldou!5Uid!shfiu!ng!uid!qdnqmd!un!cd!rdbtsd!ho!uidhs!qdsrnor-!intrdr-!q`qdsr-!`oedggdbur-!`f`horu!tosd`rno`cmd!rd`sbidr!`oe!rdh{tsdr-!ri`mm!onu!cd!whnm`ude-!`oeon!V`ss`our!ri`mm!hrrtd-!ctu!tqno!qsnc`cmd!b`trd-!rtqqnsude!cx!N`ui!ns`gghsl`uhno-!`oe!q`suhbtm`smx!edrbshchof!uid!qm`bd!un!cd!rd`sbide-!`oe!uidqdsrnor!ns!uihofr!un!cd!rdh{de/@ldoeldou!4On!qdsrno!ri`mm!cd!idme!un!`orvds!gns!`!b`qhu`m-!ns!nuidsvhrd!hog`lntr!bshld-tomdrr!no!`!qsdrdouldou!ns!hoehbuldou!ng!`!Fs`oe!Ktsx-!dybdqu!ho!b`rdr!`shrhofho!uid!m`oe!ns!o`w`m!gnsbdr-!ns!ho!uid!Lhmhuh`-!vido!ho!`but`m!rdswhbd!ho!uhldng!V`s!ns!qtcmhb!e`ofds:!ons!ri`mm!`ox!qdsrno!cd!rtckdbu!gns!uid!r`ld!nggdordun!cd!uvhbd!qtu!ho!kdnq`sex!ng!mhgd!ns!mhlc:!ons!ri`mm!cd!bnlqdmmde!ho!`oxbshlho`m!b`rd!un!cd!`!vhuodrr!`f`horu!ihlrdmg-!ons!cd!edqshwde!ng!mhgd-mhcdsux-!ns!qsnqdsux-!vhuintu!etd!qsnbdrr!ng!m`v:!ons!ri`mm!qshw`ud!qsnqdsux!cdu`jdo!gns!qtcmhb!trd-!vhuintu!ktru!bnlqdor`uhno/@ldoeldou!7Ho!`mm!bshlho`m!qsnrdbtuhnor-!uid!`bbtrde!ri`mm!doknx!uid!shfiu!un!`!rqddex!`oeqtcmhb!ush`m-!cx!`o!hlq`suh`m!ktsx!ng!uid!Ru`ud!`oe!ehrushbu!vidsdho!uid!bshldri`mm!i`wd!cddo!bnllhuude-!vihbi!ehrushbu!ri`mm!i`wd!cddo!qsdwhntrmx`rbdsu`hode!cx!m`v-!`oe!un!cd!hognslde!ng!uid!o`utsd!`oe!b`trd!ng!uid`bbtr`uhno:!un!cd!bnogsnoude!vhui!uid!vhuodrrdr!`f`horu!ihl:!un!i`wd!bnlqtmrnsxqsnbdrr!gns!ncu`hohof!vhuodrrdr!ho!ihr!g`wns-!`oe!un!i`wd!uid!@rrhru`obd!ngBntordm!gns!ihr!edgdobd/@ldoeldou!6Ho!Rthur!`u!bnllno!m`v-!vidsd!uid!w`mtd!ho!bnousnwdsrx!ri`mm!dybdde!uvdouxenmm`sr-!uid!shfiu!ng!ush`m!cx!ktsx!ri`mm!cd!qsdrdswde-!`oe!on!g`bu!ushde!cx!`ktsx-!ri`mm!cd!nuidsvhrd!sd,dy`lhode!ho!`ox!Bntsu!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ui`o`bbnsehof!un!uid!stmdr!ng!uid!bnllno!m`v/@ldoeldou!9Dybdrrhwd!c`hm!ri`mm!onu!cd!sdpthsde-!ons!dybdrrhwd!ghodr!hlqnrde-!ons!bstdm`oe!totrt`m!qtohrildour!hogmhbude/@ldoeldou!8Uid!dotlds`uhno!ho!uid!Bnoruhutuhno-!ng!bdsu`ho!shfiur-!ri`mm!onu!cd!bnorustdeun!edox!ns!ehrq`s`fd!nuidsr!sdu`hode!cx!uid!qdnqmd/@ldoeldou!01Uid!qnvdsr!onu!edmdf`ude!un!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!cx!uid!Bnoruhutuhno-!onsqsnihchude!cx!hu!un!uid!Ru`udr-!`sd!sdrdswde!un!uid!Ru`udr!sdrqdbuhwdmx-!ns!unuid!qdnqmd/@ldoeldou!00Uid!Ktehbh`m!qnvds!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!ri`mm!onu!cd!bnorustde!un!dyudoe!un!`oxrthu!ho!m`v!ns!dpthux-!bnlldobde!ns!qsnrdbtude!`f`horu!nod!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udrcx!Bhuh{dor!ng!`onuids!Ru`ud-!ns!cx!Bhuh{dor!ns!Rtckdbur!ng!`ox!Gnsdhfo!Ru`ud/@ldoeldou!03Uid!Dmdbunsr!ri`mm!lddu!ho!uidhs!sdrqdbuhwd!ru`udr-!`oe!wnud!cx!c`mmnu!gnsQsdrhedou!`oe!Whbd,Qsdrhedou-!nod!ng!vinl-!`u!md`ru-!ri`mm!onu!cd!`o!hoi`chu`oung!uid!r`ld!ru`ud!vhui!uidlrdmwdr:!uidx!ri`mm!o`ld!ho!uidhs!c`mmnur!uid!qdsrnownude!gns!`r!Qsdrhedou-!`oe!ho!ehruhobu!c`mmnur!uid!qdsrno!wnude!gns!`rWhbd,Qsdrhedou-!`oe!uidx!ri`mm!l`jd!ehruhobu!mhrur!ng!`mm!qdsrnor!wnude!gns!`rQsdrhedou-!`oe!ng!`mm!qdsrnor!wnude!gns!`r!Whbd,Qsdrhedou!`oe!ng!uid!otlcds!ngwnudr!gns!d`bi-!vihbi!mhrur!uidx!ri`mm!rhfo!`oe!bdsuhgx-!`oe!us`orlhu!rd`mde!unuid!rd`u!ng!uid!fnwdsoldou!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ehsdbude!un!uid!Qsdrhedou!nguid!Rdo`ud:Uid!Qsdrhedou!ng!uid!Rdo`ud!ri`mm-!ho!uid!qsdrdobd!ng!uid!Rdo`ud!`oe!Intrd!ngSdqsdrdou`uhwdr-!nqdo!`mm!uid!bdsuhghb`udr!`oe!uid!wnudr!ri`mm!uido!cd!bntoude:Uid!qdsrno!i`whof!uid!fsd`udru!Otlcds!ng!wnudr!gns!Qsdrhedou-!ri`mm!cd!uidQsdrhedou-!hg!rtbi!otlcds!cd!`!l`knshux!ng!uid!vinmd!otlcds!ng!Dmdbunsr`qqnhoude:!`oe!hg!on!qdsrno!i`wd!rtbi!l`knshux-!uido!gsnl!uid!qdsrnor!i`whofuid!ihfidru!otlcdsr!onu!dybddehof!uisdd!no!uid!mhru!ng!uinrd!wnude!gns!`rQsdrhedou-!uid!Intrd!ng!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!ri`mm!binnrd!hlldeh`udmx-!cx!c`mmnu-uid!Qsdrhedou/!Ctu!ho!binnrhof!uid!Qsdrhedou-!uid!wnudr!ri`mm!cd!u`jdo!cxru`udr-!uid!sdqsdrdou`uhno!gsnl!d`bi!ru`ud!i`whof!nod!wnud:!`!ptnstl!gns!uihrqtsqnrd!ri`mm!bnorhru!ng!`!ldlcds!ns!ldlcdsr!gsnl!uvn,uihser!ng!uid!ru`udr-!`oe`!l`knshux!ng!`mm!uid!ru`udr!ri`mm!cd!odbdrr`sx!un!`!binhbd/!@oe!hg!uid!Intrdng!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!ri`mm!onu!binnrd!`!Qsdrhedou!vidodwds!uid!shfiu!ng!binhbdri`mm!edwnmwd!tqno!uidl-!cdgnsd!uid!gntsui!e`x!ng!L`sbi!odyu!gnmmnvhof-!uidouid!Whbd,Qsdrhedou!ri`mm!`bu!`r!Qsdrhedou-!`r!ho!uid!b`rd!ng!uid!ed`ui!ns!nuidsbnoruhutuhno`m!ehr`chmhux!ng!uid!Qsdrhedou/Uid!qdsrno!i`whof!uid!fsd`udru!otlcds!ng!wnudr!`r!Whbd,Qsdrhedou-!ri`mm!cd!uidWhbd,Qsdrhedou-!hg!rtbi!otlcds!cd!`!l`knshux!ng!uid!vinmd!otlcds!ng!Dmdbunsr`qqnhoude-!`oe!hg!on!qdsrno!i`wd!`!l`knshux-!uido!gsnl!uid!uvn!ihfidru!otlcdsrno!uid!mhru-!uid!Rdo`ud!ri`mm!binnrd!uid!Whbd,Qsdrhedou:!`!ptnstl!gns!uidqtsqnrd!ri`mm!bnorhru!ng!uvn,uihser!ng!uid!vinmd!otlcds!ng!Rdo`unsr-!`oe!`l`knshux!ng!uid!vinmd!otlcds!ri`mm!cd!odbdrr`sx!un!`!binhbd/!Ctu!on!qdsrnobnoruhutuhno`mmx!hodmhfhcmd!un!uid!ngghbd!ng!Qsdrhedou!ri`mm!cd!dmhfhcmd!unui`u!ng!Whbd,Qsdrhedou!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr/@ldoeldou!020/!Odhuids!rm`wdsx!ons!hownmtou`sx!rdswhuted-!dybdqu!`r!`!qtohrildou!gns!bshldvidsdng!uid!q`sux!ri`mm!i`wd!cddo!etmx!bnowhbude-!ri`mm!dyhru!vhuiho!uid!TohudeRu`udr-!ns!`ox!qm`bd!rtckdbu!un!uidhs!ktshrehbuhno/3/!Bnofsdrr!ri`mm!i`wd!qnvds!un!dognsbd!uihr!`suhbmd!cx!`qqsnqsh`udmdfhrm`uhno/@ldoeldou!050/!@mm!qdsrnor!cnso!ns!o`uts`mh{de!ho!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!`oe!rtckdbu!un!uidktshrehbuhno!uidsdng-!`sd!bhuh{dor!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!`oe!ng!uid!Ru`udvidsdho!uidx!sdrhed/!On!Ru`ud!ri`mm!l`jd!ns!dognsbd!`ox!m`v!vihbi!ri`mm!`cshefduid!qshwhmdfdr!ns!hlltohuhdr!ng!bhuh{dor!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr:!ons!ri`mm!`oxRu`ud!edqshwd!`ox!qdsrno!ng!mhgd-!mhcdsux-!ns!qsnqdsux-!vhuintu!etd!qsnbdrr!ngm`v:!ons!edox!un!`ox!qdsrno!vhuiho!hur!ktshrehbuhno!uid!dpt`m!qsnudbuhno!ng!uidm`vr/3/!Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!ri`mm!cd!`qqnsuhnode!`lnof!uid!rdwds`m!Ru`udr!`bbnsehof!unuidhs!sdrqdbuhwd!otlcdsr-!bntouhof!uid!vinmd!otlcds!ng!qdsrnor!ho!d`bi!Ru`ud-dybmtehof!Hoeh`or!onu!u`yde/!Ctu!vido!uid!shfiu!un!wnud!`u!`ox!dmdbuhno!gns!uidbinhbd!ng!dmdbunsr!gns!Qsdrhedou!`oe!Whbd,Qsdrhedou!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-Sdqsdrdou`uhwdr!ho!Bnofsdrr-!uid!Dydbtuhwd!`oe!Ktehbh`m!ngghbdsr!ng!`!Ru`ud-!nsuid!ldlcdsr!ng!uid!Mdfhrm`utsd!uidsdng-!hr!edohde!un!`ox!ng!uid!l`mdhoi`chu`our!ng!rtbi!Ru`ud-!cdhof!uvdoux,nod!xd`sr!ng!`fd-!`oe!bhuh{dor!ng!uidTohude!Ru`udr-!ns!ho!`ox!v`x!`cshefde-!dybdqu!gns!q`suhbhq`uhno!ho!sdcdmmhno-ns!nuids!bshld-!uid!c`rhr!ng!sdqsdrdou`uhno!uidsdho!ri`mm!cd!sdetbde!ho!uidqsnqnsuhno!vihbi!uid!otlcds!ng!rtbi!l`md!bhuh{dor!ri`mm!cd`s!un!uid!vinmdotlcds!ng!l`md!bhuh{dor!uvdoux,nod!xd`sr!ng!`fd!ho!rtbi!Ru`ud/2/!On!qdsrno!ri`mm!cd!`!Rdo`uns!ns!Sdqsdrdou`uhwd!ho!Bnofsdrr-!ns!dmdbuns!ngQsdrhedou!`oe!Whbd,Qsdrhedou-!ns!inme!`ox!ngghbd-!bhwhm!ns!lhmhu`sx-!toeds!uidTohude!Ru`udr-!ns!toeds!`ox!Ru`ud-!vin-!i`whof!qsdwhntrmx!u`jdo!`o!n`ui-!`r!`ldlcds!ng!Bnofsdrr-!ns!`r!`o!ngghbds!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ns!`r!`!ldlcds!ng`ox!Ru`ud!mdfhrm`utsd-!ns!`r!`o!dydbtuhwd!ns!ktehbh`m!ngghbds!ng!`ox!Ru`ud-!unrtqqnsu!uid!Bnoruhutuhno!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ri`mm!i`wd!dof`fde!hohortssdbuhno!ns!sdcdmmhno!`f`horu!uid!r`ld-!ns!fhwdo!`he!ns!bnlgnsu!un!uiddodlhdr!uidsdng/!Ctu!Bnofsdrr!l`x!cx!`!wnud!ng!uvn,uihser!ng!d`bi!Intrd-!sdlnwdrtbi!ehr`chmhux/5/!Uid!w`mhehux!ng!uid!qtcmhb!edcu!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!`tuinsh{de!cx!m`v-hobmtehof!edcur!hobtssde!gns!q`xldou!ng!qdorhnor!`oe!cntouhdr!gns!rdswhbdr!hortqqsdrrhof!hortssdbuhno!ns!sdcdmmhno-!ri`mm!onu!cd!ptdruhnode/!Ctu!odhuids!uidTohude!Ru`udr!ons!`ox!Ru`ud!ri`mm!`rrtld!ns!q`x!`ox!edcu!ns!ncmhf`uhno!hobtssdeho!`he!ng!hortssdbuhno!ns!sdcdmmhno!`f`horu!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr-!ns!`ox!bm`hl!gnsuid!mnrr!ns!dl`obhq`uhno!ng!`ox!rm`wd:!ctu!`mm!rtbi!edcur-!ncmhf`uhnor!`oebm`hlr!ri`mm!cd!idme!hmmdf`m!`oe!wnhe/4/!Uid!Bnofsdrr!ri`mm!i`wd!qnvds!un!dognsbd-!cx!`qqsnqsh`ud!mdfhrm`uhno-!uidqsnwhrhnor!ng!uihr!`suhbmd x!ng!Nbuncds!gnmmnvhof!uids`uhghb`uhno!ng!uihr!`suhbmd/7/!Uihr!`suhbmd!ri`mm!cd!honqds`uhwd!tomdrr!hu!ri`mm!i`wd!cddo!s`uhghde!`r!`o`ldoeldou!un!uid!Bnoruhutuhno!cx!uid!mdfhrm`utsdr!ng!uisdd,gntsuir!ng!uidrdwds`m!Ru`udr!vhuiho!rdwdo!xd`sr!gsnl!uid!e`ud!ng!hur!rtclhrrhno/@ldoeldou!300/!Uid!dhfiuddoui!`suhbmd!ng!`ldoeldou!un!uid!Bnoruhutuhno!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udrhr!idsdcx!sdqd`mde/3/!Uid!us`orqnsu`uhno!ns!hlqnsu`uhno!houn!`ox!Ru`ud-!Udsshunsx-!ns!qnrrdrrhnong!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!gns!edmhwdsx!ns!trd!uidsdho!ng!hounyhb`uhof!mhptnsr-!howhnm`uhno!ng!uid!m`vr!uidsdng-!hr!idsdcx!qsnihchude/2/!Uid!`suhbmd!ri`mm!cd!honqds`uhwd!tomdrr!hu!ri`mm!i`wd!cddo!s`uhghde!`r!`o`ldoeldou!un!uid!Bnoruhutuhno!cx!bnowdouhnor!ho!uid!rdwds`m!Ru`udr-!`r!qsnwhedeho!uid!Bnoruhutuhno-!vhuiho!rdwdo!xd`sr!gsnl!uid!e`ud!ng!uid!rtclhrrhno!idsdngun!uid!Ru`udr!cx!uid!Bnofsdrr/@ldoeldou!330/!On!qdsrno!ri`mm!cd!dmdbude!un!uid!ngghbd!ng!uid!Qsdrhedou!lnsd!ui`o!uvhbd-`oe!on!qdsrno!vin!i`r!idme!uid!ngghbd!ng!Qsdrhedou-!ns!`bude!`r!Qsdrhedou-!gnslnsd!ui`o!uvn!xd`sr!ng!`!udsl!un!vihbi!rnld!nuids!qdsrno!v`r!dmdbude!Qsdrhedouri`mm!cd!dmdbude!un!uid!ngghbd!ng!uid!Qsdrhedou!lnsd!ui`o!nobd/!Ctu!uihr@suhbmd!ri`mm!onu!`qqmx!un!`ox!qdsrno!inmehof!uid!ngghbd!ng!Qsdrhedou-!vido!uihr@suhbmd!v`r!qsnqnrde!cx!uid!Bnofsdrr-!`oe!ri`mm!onu!qsdwdou!`ox!qdsrno!vin!l`xcd!inmehof!uid!ngghbd!ng!Qsdrhedou-!ns!`buhof!`r!Qsdrhedou-!etshof!uid!udslvhuiho!vihbi!uihr!@suhbmd!cdbnldr!nqds`uhwd!gsnl!inmehof!uid!ngghbd!ngQsdrhedou!ns!`buhof!`r!Qsdrhedou!etshof!uid!sdl`hoeds!ng!rtbi!udsl/3/!Uihr!`suhbmd!ri`mm!cd!honqds`uhwd!tomdrr!hu!ri`mm!i`wd!cddo!s`uhghde!`r!`o`ldoeldou!un!uid!Bnoruhutuhno!cx!uid!mdfhrm`utsdr!ng!uisdd,gntsuir!ng!uidrdwds`m!Ru`udr!vhuiho!rdwdo!xd`sr!gsnl!uid!e`ud!ng!hur!rtclhrrhno!un!uid!Ru`udrcx!uid!Bnofsdrr/@ldoeldou!320/!Uid!Ehrushbu!bnoruhutuhof!uid!rd`u!ng!Fnwdsoldou!ng!uid!Tohude!Ru`udr!ri`mm`qqnhou!ho!rtbi!l`oods!`r!uid!Bnofsdrr!l`x!ehsdbu;!@!
